oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A ceremony performed with the Brachycerus (African Ground Weevil) in order to preserve young babies from convulsions. In the Katkop dialect by Díä!kwãin (L V.
5840) The Brachycerus used to cure illness in little children. By /han≠kass’o (L VIII.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Brachycerus The used as a means of cure for little children; the same insect not used again when another child is ill
